summary: An Irish immigrant and his daughter move into a town in the American South with a magical piece of gold that will change people's lives, including a struggling farmer and African American citizens threatened by a bigoted politician.
cast: Fred Astaire|Petula Clark|Tommy Steele|Don Francks|Keenan Wynn|Barbara Hancock|Al Freeman Jr.|Ronald Colby|Dolph Sweet|Wright King|Louil Silas|Brenda Arnau|Charles Carter|Robert Cleaves|Robert Cole|Willie Covan|Evelyn Dutton|Martin Eric|Joe Evans|Talya Ferro|James Field|Carey Foster|Lili Francks|Nicci-Ann Frank|Roy Glenn|Jester Hairston|Louis Hart|Marya Henriques|Robert S. Holman|Joyce Horne|Vince Howard|Bruce Hoy|Bobby Johnson|Carlton Johnson|Phyllis Kennedy|Avon Long|Maurishka|Bert May|Gary Menteer|Frances E. Nealy|Roy Palmer|Frank Radcliffe|Leonard Rogel|Roberta Tennes|Claude Thompson|Peter Virgo|Rebecca Vorno|Clessia Wade|Jonathan Wynne
title: El valle del arco iris
